Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the "New York State buy North American act"
Summary: Enacts the "New York State buy North American act" which requires the state, municipalities, public authorities and covered affordable housing projects to award contracts for the supply of manufactured products used in building projects to bidders who produce such manufactured products used in building projects primarily in North America; defines terms; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add §162-b, St Fin L; add §104-e, Gen Muni L; add §2877-b, Pub Auth L; ren Art 50 §§1000 - 1003 to be Art 60 §§1101 - 1103, add Art 50 §§1010 - 1012, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the general municipal law, the public authorities law and the executive law, in relation to enacting the "New York State buy North American act"
